Text data transformation utility for easy text transformations based on random character changes. Example usage : const textformer = new Textformer( { // Target HTML Element output: "demo-title", // Texts from: '1337', to: 'Textformer', // Core mode: Textformer.modes.expand, steps: 10, stagger: 3, randomness: 2, origin: 0, // Autoplay autoplay: true, speed: 15, delay: 500, duration: 0, } );
